Description: 4 digit number indicating to which season(s) the specified timeframe belongs to.
REG' or 'POST' indicating if the game belongs to regular or post season.
Season week
Abbreviation of Team of Player
ESPN Player ID
Short name of player (First Initial, Last Name)
QBR Rank in specified timeframe
Adjusted Total QBR, which adjusts quarterback play on 0-100 scale adjusted for strength of opposing defenses played.
Number of points contributed by a quarterback above the average level QB
Total dropbacks for the quarterback (excludes handoffs)
Total Expected Points Added by quarterback, calculated by ESPN Win Probability Model
Expected Points Added on pass plays
Expected Points Added on run plays
Expected Points Added on penalties
Raw total QBR, does not adjust for strength of opposing defenses played.
Expected Points Added on sacks

Last Name of Quarterback
Full Name of Quarterback
Link to ESPN Headshot of Player
Full Team Name of Player
True/False indicator of whether or not player meets minimum play requirement
